subject: Basketball
Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Magic Johnson has transcended N.B.A. stardom as the face of H.I.V. and as a thriving businessman, and his social impact has been immeasurable.
snippet: Magic Johnson has transcended N.B.A. stardom as the face of H.I.V. and as a thriving businessman, and his social impact has been immeasurable.
